Text: I am the only candidate for Congress in Georgia’s 1st District who trusts women to make their own healthcare decisions. Elections matter, and your vote makes a difference.
Now that the Supreme Court has reversed Roe v. Wade, Congress must act to restore reproductive rights. When elected, I will fight for federal legislation to ensure women's right to choose.

The Supreme Court made the wrong decision to overturn well-established law based on the fundamental right of privacy. I trust women to make healthcare choices about their bodies. Reproductive rights are healthcare rights.

We know it’s time for action, but unfortunately my Democratic opponent disagrees.

Since Republicans let it expire, mass shootings have tripled. 

With your support, I will fight for common sense gun reform in Congress and protect our future generations.
